smartr 0.1.0
  • Reference

Get sampling interval

get_si.Rd

Get sampling interval

get_si(pop, m)

Arguments

pop

Total population
m

Number of clusters to be selected

Value

An integer value for the sampling interval

Examples

get_si(clusterList$pop, m = 30)

#>   [1] 17  6  9  8 13 11 12 10 12  6 34 35 41 38 47 46 18 27 22 27 16 13 17 17 30
